All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Admin class is a subclass of User class and it has some methods to control the restaurant
Authentication
Authentication methods of the program
Chef
Chef class is a subclass of Worker class which represents the Chefs of the restaurant.
Courier
Courier class is a subclass of Worker class which represents the Courier of the restaurant.
Customer
Customer class is a user type that expresses the target audience of the restaurant derived from the user class.
Food
It's a class that represents a food item
Menu
The Menu class is a class that contains Food objects.
Order
Order class is used to represent the order of the Customer
Order.ComparatorbyOrderNumber
This class implements the Comparator interface and overrides the compare method It compares orders according to their account balance
Order.OrderStatus
An enum class.
Restaurant
This class represents the Restaurant in the system.
User
The user class includes all users in the system.
Worker
Worker class is a subclass of User class which represents the Workers of the restaurant.
Worker.WorkerStatus
Status of the worker will be change according to it's experience year, certificate number etc.
